briefTitle: The Radiation Metabolic Signature of Patient Undergoing Radiotherapy. A Pilot Study
officialTitle: The Radiation Metabolic Signature of Patient Undergoing Radiotherapy. A Pilot Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change from baseline in radiation metabolites
eligibilityCriteria: Radiotherapy: cancer treatment with total doses of more than 30 Gy, single fraction dose of at least 1.8 Gy/die. Big treatment/target volume. Age over 50 years, according to postmenopausal status. No simultaneous chemotherapy in breast cancer patients. For the control group: healthy volunteers (women), age over 50 years, according to postmenopausal status; no previous chemo - and cancer therapy.
